title: My Pixel 3xl is saying no SIM and keeps kicking me off mobile data and my home WiFi... Help please?
content: I've restarted my phone, I've performed a soft reset, I've turn on and off and forced stopped everything, I've tried everything except a new SIM card. It will work for a few minutes afterwards but just keeps happening!
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 3 XL
